description.name: shiberc20
description.tagline: SHIBA INU erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-shib Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept SHIBA INU erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/shib receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/shib wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
